title: Help me!
body:
When I press Alt + drag mouse, and here is bug, please tell me how to fix error, and same when i press ctrl + left click program.



P/s: My English is bad, I'm Asian

replies.body:
This is an interesting issue. So far, it seems like visual errors like this are almost always by some program running in the background that has an overlay. Try checking your pc for something like Discord or Spotify that uses overlays, turn that program off, and see if you still get this issue then.

Be sure to test these changes in a custom game, and let me know if that doesn't help!
Thanks, I have fixed the bug
